“Mom, please! Don’t make me do this!,” said Monica to her mother as she drove her to her high school.

Her mother was not sympathetic. “Maybe you’ll try harder next time,” she said.

Monica’s mother, Mary, had an interesting way of punishing her daughter when she did wrong. Instead of grounding her, she’d humiliate her in some way. She thought doing that would scare her out of making the same mistake again. Monica once came home past curfew, so Mary spent the next day with her at school. She sat with her in all her classes. She went with her daughter everywhere, even the bathroom and the locker room. Monica never missed curfew again.

Monica wasn’t doing well in school. She had gotten two F’s on her last report card in both Algebra and History. Mary felt that Monica was spending too much time with friends and guys and not enough time studying. This wasn’t the first time Monica had gotten an F, but this was the first Mary was doing something about it. She came up with something that she believed would force Monica to work harder, but Monica thought this was going too far.

They got to the school. Mary stopped right in front of the building where all the students were waiting to be let into the school. “We’re here. Time to get out of the car,” said Mary. Monica looked down at herself. “Please, let’s go back home. I’ll work harder. I promise,” she said.

“I’ve heard that before. You need motivation,” said Mary.

“Not this kind of motivation,” said Monica.

“Get out of the car, Monica.”

“I can’t go to school like this.”

“If you don’t get out of the car, I’ll drag you out.”

Monica knew she had no choice. She knew her mother would really drag her out of the car if she refused to get out. She looked down at her body again, picked up her book bag, and got out of the car.

Monica’s appearance quickly drew attention from the other students. “Goodbye. I love you,” said Mary as she drove off, leaving Monica standing on the sidewalk in front of everyone…

12232112221.content:
Monica put down the bottle, and rolled onto her stomach, pulling herself into a kneeling position. She looked around, and did not hear her mother. She turned off the baby monitor, and stood up. She began to climb out of the crib, and lowered herself to the ground. She left the room, and crept into her mother's room. She saw her phone sitting on the vanity, and grabbed it, walking back to her room. She shut the door, and walked over to the window, opening it. Before she climbed through it, she realized she was wearing a baby outfit. She crept back into her mother's room, where she took a pair of jeans and a t shirt. She grabbed her sneakers, and went back to her room. She shut the door, and began to take off the baby clothes. She realized she didn't have any underwear, but shrugged it off. She finished getting dressed, put her phone in her pocket, and climbed out the first floor window. She ran the half block to her friend Carly's house. When she got there, she texted Carly to tell her she was there. Carly came to the front door and let Monica in. Monica hugged Carly, tearing up. "Monica, are you ok? I saw you at school earlier. What happened?" Carly asked. "My grades were crap, so my mom decided to put me in a diaper and baby clothes." Monica replied. "That sucks. Come on, let's go hang in my room." Carly said, and the two went upstairs.
"So why do you think your mom chose that punishment?" Carly asked while the two were watching tv. "I don't know, but it sucks and I hate it." Monica said. "Well if you hate it so much, I suggest you get your grades up, and then I won't treat you as a baby anymore." a chilling voice said from behind the girls. Monica turned around and saw her mother. She looked absolutely furious. She approached Monica and took her wrist aggressively. "Didn't I tell you that you can only leave the house for school when you're grounded, young lady?" she asked. Monica didn't reply; she was too frightened. "Monica!" her mother repeated. Monica nodded. She felt a warm, wet sensation running down her legs. She looked down, and saw that she had peed herself. "Are those my jeans? Where is your diaper, young lady?" Mary raged. She harshly picked Monica up, not caring that she would get wet. She carried her home, and brought her into the bathroom. She put Monica on a towel on the floor, and began running a bath. "Stay here." she told Monica harshly. Monica, scared, did not move. Mary went to get a diaper, powder, and a onesie. She came back carrying the items, and put them on the counter. Mary shut off the faucet, and put Monica in the tub. Monica cried as her mother bathed her, ashamed. Once Monica was clean from head to toe, Mary took her out of the tub, and dried her off. She laid her on the towel, and began applying powder. She took Monica's legs, and put the diaper under her. She put Monica's legs down, and taped up the diaper. She put the onesie on Monica, and picked her up. She carried her into the kitchen, and took a bottle out of the fridge. She heated it up, and put it toward Monica's mouth. Monica would not open up. "You'd better open up now, young lady. You're in enough trouble as it is. Does baby want a spanking?" Mary threatens. Monica whimpers, and opens her mouth, allowing Mary to stick the bottle in. Monica reluctantly drank her bottle. Her mom was really scaring her, so she began to squirm, trying to get out of Mary's grasp. "What do you want now? Do you need a diaper change already?" Mary asked. Monica shook her head, and pointed down. "Does baby want down?" Mary asks. Monica nods. Mary carries her to her nursery, and puts her in her crib. "Finish that bottle, Monica, and then go to sleep." Mary tells her. Monica nods. "Naughty baby." Marry mutters, shutting off the light, leaving.

info.brief_description: Monica’s grades slip, so her mother comes up with a humiliating way to get her to improve.
info.description:
Monica is a 16 year old high school student living with her mother. After getting an F in two of her classes, her mother decides to punish her for it in the most horrible way possible. Now Monica must work on getting her grades up while dealing with all the stares and laughter from the other students because of that punishment.

Rules:

No killing of any characters and no rape.
